section.title: Manual Installation
section.simpara: This installation is based on the instructions at http://www.eurekastreams.org/build-and-run/.

note.simpara: These steps use sudo to run commands as root. You could also run sudo -i to become root.

listitem.screen: sudo yum -y install memcached sudo /sbin/service memcached start sudo /sbin/chkconfig memcached on

section.title: Retrieve source code for Eureka Streams
section.simpara: These steps use git to clone the Eureka Streams source code from Github.

listitem.simpara: Become root with a login shell
Clone the repo to an appropriate location

section.title: Install Maven dependencies
section.simpara: These steps install the Apache Shindig Social Connector using the source from the Eureka Streams repository. Eureka Streams depends on a specific version of Shindig that is currently unavailable in the Apache public repository.

note.simpara: These steps assume you are still logged in as root.

listitem.simpara: Change into the top level directory of the Eureka Streams local repo:

listitem.screen:
mvn install:install-file -Dfile=lib/shindig-common-3.3.jar -DgroupId=org.apache.shindig \ -DartifactId=shindig-common -Dversion=3.3 -Dpackaging=jar -DgeneratePom=true
mvn install:install-file -Dfile=lib/shindig-features-3.3.jar -DgroupId=org.apache.shindig \ -DartifactId=shindig-features -Dversion=3.3 -Dpackaging=jar -DgeneratePom=true
mvn install:install-file -Dfile=lib/shindig-gadgets-3.3.jar -DgroupId=org.apache.shindig \ -DartifactId=shindig-gadgets -Dversion=3.3 -Dpackaging=jar -DgeneratePom=true
mvn install:install-file -Dfile=lib/shindig-server-3.3.war -DgroupId=org.apache.shindig \ -DartifactId=shindig-server -Dversion=3.3 -Dpackaging=war -DgeneratePom=true
mvn install:install-file -Dfile=lib/shindig-social-api-3.3.jar -DgroupId=org.apache.shindig \ -DartifactId=shindig-social-api -Dversion=3.3 -Dpackaging=jar -DgeneratePom=true
mvn install:install-file -Dfile=lib/shindig-common-3.3-tests.jar -DgroupId=org.apache.shindig \ -DartifactId=shindig-common -Dversion=3.3 -Dpackaging=test-jar -DgeneratePom=true
mvn install:install-file -Dfile=lib/gwt-dnd-2.6.5.2.jar -DgroupId=com.google.code.gwt-dnd \ -DartifactId=gwt-dnd -Dversion=2.6.5.2 -Dpackaging=jar -DgeneratePom=true
mvn install:install-file -Dfile=lib/carousel-0.6.1.jar -DgroupId=com.gwtyuicarousel \ -DartifactId=carousel -Dversion=0.6.1 -Dpackaging=jar -DgeneratePom=true
mvn install:install-file -Dfile=lib/urlrewrite-3.2.0-beta.jar -DgroupId=org.tuckey \ -DartifactId=urlrewrite -Dversion=3.2.0-beta -Dpackaging=jar -DgeneratePom=true
